The 'Cyprus University of Technology' (CUT) ( or "Î¤Î.Î Î.Î.", ), is a university
established in 2004. Its first intake of students was for the academic year 2007-
08. The establishment of the CUT is an attempt to fill in gaps that
still exist within Cyprusâ higher education by offering degrees in undergraduate
and post graduate levels that are not offered by the University of Cyprus or by
other higher education institutions.

It is based in Limassol, the second largest city in Cyprus. [http://www.cyprus-
mail.com/news/main_old.php?id=12333&archive=1 The Cyprus Mail (archive article,
Saturday, December 20, 2003)] It was officially inaugurated in September
2007 by then-President of Cyprus, Tassos Papadopoulos.
